title: Textile, 1820–30
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave; mordant for red
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 241 x 84.5 cm (7 ft. 10 7/8 in. x 33 1/4 in.)
Repeat H: 23.5 cm (9 1/4 in.)
description: Length of printed fabric with pattern in red: offset arrangement of three scenes within horizontal rectangular octagons. Each scene a landscape with classical antique ruins. A small medallion above each octagon-one containing the bust of Licurges, one homer, and the third Solon.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1820–30.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave; mordant for red. 1976-18-1.
